item.title: Why Your Prequalification Documents Matter More Than You Think
item.description: Most borrowers treat prequalification documents like a bureaucratic chore. You scan some paystubs, forward tax returns, and hope the lender does not ask for more. In reality, the documents you submit during prequalification shape your entire mortgage experience. They determine your approval speed, your final rate, and whether surprises derail you at the finish line. Understanding why lenders request each piece and how to organize them properly gives you a massive advantage. Here is what actually matters and how to get it right the first time.
